Translations.Text: Ili hav bon news di blessings kaj grace kaj ti DI neniam fails rekompenc believers
those respond al DI messenger persecution ili sufer argument their bon works plumb righteous life great rekompenc
When popol dir al them Popol mobilized vi; vi tim them this nur strengthens their faith ili dir DI suffices us; Li est put Protector
Ili ind di blessings grace ne harm ever tusx them ili ating di approval DI POSED infinite grace
est diabl sistem instill tim his subjekt. Ne tim them tim Me instead se vi est believers
Ne saddened those hasten disbelieve! Ili neniam dolor DI en des malplej Instead DI hav willed ke ili ne hav akci Hereafter Ili incurred terrible retribution
Those choose disbelief belief ne dolor DI en des malplej ili incurred painful retribution
Let ne disbelievers opini ni plumb them por their own bon Ni nur plumb them sur konfirm their sinfulness! Ili incurred humiliating retribution

DI NE est LAS believers VI EST SEN DISTING MAV EL bon Nor does DI inform vi de future DI bestows such knowledge whomever Li chooses His messengers! Do vi kred en DI His messengers. Vi kred plumb righteous life vi ricev great recompense

Let ne those withhold hoard di provisions opini this est bon them; gxi est mav por them! Por ili port their hoarding their kol Tag Resurrection. DI est ultimate inheritor DE heavens TER. DI EST fully Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
DI auxd utterances those DIR DI est poor while NI est RICX. NI record CXIO ILI DIR just as NI recorded their killing prophets unjustly NI DIR SUFER retribution INFER
This est consequence your own works DI est neniam unjust towards popol

est ili dir DI far covenant us ke ni ne kred en any messenger li produkt ofert ke gets konsum fajr. Dir Messengers me ven al vi klar proofs including ki vi just postul! Why tiam vi kill them vi did est truthful
Ili reject vi messengers vi rejected eben ili brought proofs Psalm enlightening scripture
Cxiu ul gust death tiam vi ricev your recompense Tag Resurrection! Whoever misses Infer barely far gxi Paradise ating great triumf! life this mond est ne plur than iluzi
